thread.title: BRIEF-Emd Serono - Co, Pfizer Canada Announce Health Canada Approval For Bavencio For Treating Metastatic Merkel Cell Carcinoma In Previously Treated Adults

title: BRIEF-Emd Serono - Co, Pfizer Canada Announce Health Canada Approval For Bavencio For Treating Metastatic Merkel Cell Carcinoma In Previously Treated Adults
text: Market News February 22, 2018 / 7:17 PM / Updated 25 minutes ago BRIEF-Emd Serono - Co, Pfizer Canada Announce Health Canada Approval For Bavencio For Treating Metastatic Merkel Cell Carcinoma In Previously Treated Adults Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Merck Kgaa: * EMD SERONO - CO, PFIZER CANADA ANNOUNCE HEALTH CANADA APPROVAL FOR BAVENCIO FOR TREATING METASTATIC MERKEL CELL CARCINOMA IN PREVIOUSLY TREATED ADULTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
